time_sensitive_logic.open_timeout: Channels require both parties to join within a specified time
time_sensitive_logic.update_timeout: State updates and disputes in virtual channels are limited by the update timeout

conditional_logic_paths.channel_open_or_closed: Functions behave differently depending on whether channels are open or closed
conditional_logic_paths.is_in_settlement_state: Virtual channels follow different paths when they are in settlement state
